faq_user_data.question_1: Do I have to pay to use the app?
faq_user_data.answer_1: Downloading the app and browsing through partners and their offers is free. If you'd like to start redeeming offers, you need to register and make a payment.
faq_user_data.question_2: What packages can I buy within the app?
faq_user_data.answer_2_4: You can check out some of our partners
faq_user_data.answer_3: Hodalica is the first and only mobile application in the region that allows you to get a discount on the spot and track your savings. With the calculator available on the app, you can track your savings in real time, after each purchase.
faq_user_data.question_4: Do I pay immediately for the use of the app?
faq_user_data.answer_4: You pay once a year for a package that gives you access to our partners' offers.
faq_user_data.question_5: What if I no longer want to use the app?
faq_user_data.answer_5: If you no longer wish to use Hodalica, you can simply choose to not renew your payment after your active package expires.
faq_user_data.question_6: Who should I contact if have additional questions or technical difficulties?
faq_user_data.answer_6: For all questions you can drop us a line at info@hodalica.com or call us at +387 61 572 759.

faq_parter_data.question_1: How do I become a Hodalica partner?
faq_parter_data.answer_1: You can contact us via e-mail address partneri@hodalica.com and provide basic information: name of your business, address, name, last name, and phone number. After we receive your email, we'll reach out to set up a meeting.
faq_parter_data.question_2: Can I keep track of the number of new customers who come to me through the app
faq_parter_data.answer_2_1: Through a specially created free platform, you can:
faq_parter_data.answer_2_2: 1. Track the number of new clients who have reached you trough Hodalica app
faq_parter_data.answer_2_3: 2. Compare the popularity of your offers
faq_parter_data.answer_2_4: 3. Categorize your clients by age and gender
faq_parter_data.question_3: Do I have to pay to become a Hodalica partner?
faq_parter_data.answer_3: No, registration for partners on the application is completely free. Hodalica does not take a percentage of the services or products sold - all exclusive discounts are given directly to the app users.
faq_parter_data.question_4: What if at some point I want to stop being a Hodalica partner?
faq_parter_data.answer_4: The partnership can be terminated by the terms and conditions set out in the Partnership Agreement that you sign when accessing the application.
faq_parter_data.question_5: Does the partnership last for an unlimited period of time?
faq_parter_data.answer_5: The partnership with Hodalica is concluded for one year. After that you can either choose to renew or terminate the partnership.
